titleStmt.title: A copy of the petition of the Divines of the Assembly, delivered to both Houses of Parliament, Iuly 19, 1643. Together, with the Houses answer to the said petition. This is entred according to order, Henery Walley.
titleStmt.author: Westminster Assembly
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G.M. for Christopher Meredith, at the signe of the Crane in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
